name: WeightReductionRecommended
title: Weight Reduction Recommended
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for discussion, education and  management of weight reduction.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Intervention or Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent discussion, education and  management of weight reduction.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represents conditions associated with HIV infection.)
